description: Try our easy to follow Lamb, Rocket & Honey Dijon Dressing Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,BBQ,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Sesame free
name: Lamb, Rocket & Honey Dijon Dressing Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 tbs extra virgin olive oil (2 tbs for cooking and 2 tbs for salad)

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the cutlets generously with MasterFoods Red, Wine & Garlic Marinade and refrigerate for at least 20 minutes before cooking. For extra tenderness and flavour, marinate overnight in the refrigerator.
Heat olive oil on BBQ, pan or grill over a medium to high heat. Cook lamb for 3 minutes on each side, turning once.

Combine in a small bowl, whisk together the Honey & Dijon Vinaigrette, a splash of extra virgin olive oil and a squeeze of lemon. Season to taste. Top with rocket leaves, onions, shaved parmesan and capers with Honey Dijon Dressing.
Serve with lemon wedges and crusty bread or croutons.
